about_the_game:
Unique Gameplay:
Create reflection lines through drawing, allowing the magic ball to reflect and thus control it. Additionally, drawing a reflection line just before the magic ball impacts can grant a powerful "spell" for an attack!

Interesting Spell Combinations:
Defeating monsters during the journey yields various "runes" with different functions, which can be combined into spells in different ways. Try to use understanding and creativity to create powerful and interesting spells!

Distinctive Monsters:
Carefully designed monsters fight in their own unique ways, challenging the witch's ability to use reflection lines effectively.

Strategic Destination Planning:
Different destinations host different monsters, and the probability of finding "runes" varies. Therefore, choosing destinations wisely allows avoiding monsters one may not be adept at handling and increases the chances of crafting desired spells.

Journal of Spell Exploration:
The witch travels in pursuit of spell knowledge, keeping a journal filled with numerous "experiments to be conducted". Join the witch in completing all experiment objectives to gain a deeper understanding of spells and unlock their full potential!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Reflection Witch" is a Roguelike game that offers a unique reinterpretation of the classic brick-breaking genre. By drawing lines to create reflection panels, players can control and enhance the magic ball. Join the witch on an adventurous journey to explore the world of spells!
